original_title: John Cale and Guests: The Velvet Underground & Nico
overview: Live at Philharmonie de Paris, Paris, France - April 3, 2016. John Cale performed The Velvet Underground & Nico in full, joined by guest performers including Animal Collective, Mark Lanegan, Pete Doherty and Carl Barât of The Libertines, Lou Doillon, Etienne Daho and Lemon Jelly’s Nick Franglen.
title: John Cale and Guests: The Velvet Underground & Nico
